overview: The Montplaisyr Count and his servant Finouille Le Craspouille are chased by the monstrous Guillemette who thrusts them into the future for better and funniest. They go from medieval boorish pleasures to the worldly orgies of the 20th century in a long string of experiences that has them dumbfounded. An astounding interpretation with an international cast, an unbelievable luxury, an eventful script, packed with explicit actions of demoniacal intensity...
title: Les Visiteuses
